text: aur jab un ke samne hamari ayate padi jati hai jo bilkul saaaf saaf hai tuh ye log jin ko hamare paas ane ki ummid nahi hai yo kehte hai ke is ke siva koi dosra Qurâ€™an laiyye, ya is mein kuch tarmim kar dijiye, aap(sallallahualaihiwassallam) yo keh dijiye ke mujhe ye haq nahi ke main apni taraf se is mein tarmim kardo, bus main tuh osi ka itteba karonga jo mere paas wahi ke zariye se pahocha hai, agar main apne rab ki na-farmaani karo, to main ek bade din ke azaab ka nadesha rakhta hoon
